MaterialId.description: Defines a unique identifier for the material.

MaterialName.description: Defines a user-readable name of the material.

data.description: Defines a unique identifier for the material.
Defines a user-readable name of the material.

AddProduct.description: Creates an object with the JobType from the address space.

RemoveProduct.description: Removes an object with the JobType from the address space.

BatchId.description: Defines a unique Id of this Batch.

BatchName.description: Defines the name of this Batch.

JobId.description: Defines a unique Id of this job.

JobName.description: Defines the name of this job.

ProductId.description: Defines a unique Id of this product.

ProductName.description: Defines the name of this product.

data.description: Defines a unique Id of this product.

FeedRateMeasuringInterval.description: Defines the measuring interval for evaluating the current flowrate.

FillingTime.description: Defines the maximal duration for the filling process to take place. Needs to be completed during this period.

FineFeedWeight.description: Defines the volume to be dosed in fine flow.

InFlightWeight.description: Defines the volume that is behind the valve / in flight after feeding is stopped.

JogFeed.description: Defines if an additional dosage is necessary.

MinimumDeltaPerFeedRateMeasuringInterval.description: Defines the minimum amount of weight data which needs to change within the FeedRateMeasuringInterval.

SettlingTime.description: Defines the time that needs to be passed before measurement process can be triggered.

TareId.description: Defines an Id of tare value for the current product or item.

TargetWeight.description: Defines the preset of the volume to be processed.

data.description: Defines the measuring interval for evaluating the current flowrate.
Defines the maximal duration for the filling process to take place. Needs to be completed during this period.

Defines the preset of the volume to be processed.

AddZone.description: Adds a zone to the zone array.

RemoveZone.description: Removes a zone from the zone array.

PresetHeight.description: Defines the predefined height (in direction of global gravity) of the measured item. The value must be write before the item is measured.

PresetLength.description: Defines the predefined length (in direction of travel) of the measured item. The value must be written before the item is measured.

PresetWidth.description: Defines the predefined width (in third possible orthogonal direction to height and length) of the measured item. The value must be write before the item is measured.

data.description: Defines the predefined height (in direction of global gravity) of the measured item. The value must be write before the item is measured.
Defines the predefined length (in direction of travel) of the measured item. The value must be written before the item is measured.
Defines the predefined width (in third possible orthogonal direction to height and length) of the measured item. The value must be write before the item is measured.

UnitPrice.description: Defines the price per weight unit.

data.description: Defines the price per weight unit.

NominalWeight.description: Defines the nominal (printed) weight of the product.

data.description: Defines the nominal (printed) weight of the product.

MaterialDensity.description: Defines the density of the used material.

TargetFlowRate.description: Defines a preset of flowrate that needs to be conveyed. This value defines the setpoint for the FlowRate control loop.

TargetWeight.description: Defines a preset of the volume to be processed.

data.description: Defines the density of the used material.
Defines a preset of flowrate that needs to be conveyed. This value defines the setpoint for the FlowRate control loop.

SetTargetPieceCount.description: Sets the value of TargetPieceCount. See TargetPieceCount.

CurrentItemCount.description: Defines the current number of items that are captured by the scale.

FeedRateMeasuringInterval.description: Defines the measurement interval for evaluating the current flowrate.

FillingTime.description: Defines the interval during which the filling has to be completed.

InFlightCount.description: Defines the number of items that is behind valve / in flight after feeding is stopped.

JogFeed.description: Defines if an additional dosage is necessary.

MinimumDeltaPerFeedRateMeasuringInterval.description: Defines the minimum amount of weight that needs to change within the FeedRateMeasuringInterval. Otherwise the filling procedure is not valid.

NumberOfReferencePieces.description: Defines the number of pieces that need to be used for reference process.

ReferencePieceWeight.description: Defines the reference weight of a piece.

RegisteredPieceCount.description: Defines the number of pieces that were actually counted related to the ReferencePieceWeight.

SettlingTime.description: Defines the time that needs to be passed before measurement process can be triggered.

TareId.description: Defines the Id of tare value for the current product or item.

TargetItemCount.description: Defines the number of items that are supposed to be counted during the measurement process.

TargetPieceCount.description: Defines the number of pieces that need to be counted.

TotalizedItemCount.description: Defines the summed up number of items. Will be reset either triggered by the user or a different product selection.

TotalizedWeight.title: WeightType
TotalizedWeight.description: Defines the summed up number of weight. Will be reset either triggered by the user or a different product selection.

RecipeNodeId.description: Defines the NodeId of the recipe that is being produced.

Report.description: Defines an array with the various messages from the recipe. Each RecipeElement generates its own report message.

data.description: Defines the NodeId of the recipe that is being produced.
Defines an array with the various messages from the recipe. Each RecipeElement generates its own report message.

TipCounter.description: Defines the number of fillings (downpour, bulk produce)

VolumeTargetValue.description: Defines the preset of the volume to be processed.

data.description: Defines the number of fillings (downpour, bulk produce)
Defines the preset of the volume to be processed.

TargetValue.description: Defines the value to be reached of the TargetValue of an aggregate that is referenced by TargetValueId.

TargetValueId.description: Defines a unique Id of the aggregate that is being activated. A list of all possible TargetValueIds is defined in RecipeScaleDeviceType.

data.description: Defines the value to be reached of the TargetValue of an aggregate that is referenced by TargetValueId.

TargetThresholdValue.description: The target value with which the threshold value is compared.

ThresholdValueId.description: Defines an Id of process value that needs to be monitored and is element of the SupportedThresholdValues in the RecipeScale.

ThresholdValueNodeId.description: The NodeId of process value that needs to be monitored and is element of the SupportedThresholdValues in the RecipeScale. This variable should be used if the value is part of the address space.

Timeout.description: Timeout specifies the duration within the TargetThresholdValue needs to be reached. If Timeout is exceeded and operator intervention is necessary.

data.description: The target value with which the threshold value is compared.
Defines an Id of process value that needs to be monitored and is element of the SupportedThresholdValues in the RecipeScale.
The NodeId of process value that needs to be monitored and is element of the SupportedThresholdValues in the RecipeScale. This variable should be used if the value is part of the address space.
Timeout specifies the duration within the TargetThresholdValue needs to be reached. If Timeout is exceeded and operator intervention is necessary.

EqualityAndRelationalOperator.description: This enumeration describes the different condition modes for an analog condition.

ConditionMode.title: EqualityAndRelationalOperator
ConditionMode.description: Defines the type of condition operator that is used.

TargetThresholdValue.description: The target value with which the threshold value is compared.

data.description: The target value with which the threshold value is compared.

ConditionMode.title: EdgeOperator
ConditionMode.description: Defines the type of condition operator that is used.

TargetThresholdValue.description: The target value with which the threshold value is compared.

data.description: The target value with which the threshold value is compared.

Duration.description: Defines the period of time the processing needs to wait before processing the next RecipeElement.

data.description: Defines the period of time the processing needs to wait before processing the next RecipeElement.

DisplayText.description: Defines instructions for this RecipeElement that will be displayed to the user.

InstructionId.description: Defines a unique Id used to identify the instruction that is displayed via DisplayText.

data.description: Defines instructions for this RecipeElement that will be displayed to the user.
Defines a unique Id used to identify the instruction that is displayed via DisplayText.

TargetWeight.description: Defines the preset of the volume to be processed.

WeighingModuleNodeId.description: Defines the Id of the load cell which is used for weighing the product.

data.description: Defines the preset of the volume to be processed.
Defines the Id of the load cell which is used for weighing the product.

AddRecipe.description: Method to add an additional recipe of RecipeType.

RemoveRecipe.description: Method to remove a recipe of RecipeType.

RecipeId.description: RecipeId defines a unique identifier of a recipe.

RecipeName.description: Defines a user-readable name of the recipe.

Weighed.description: This flag indicates that the element is considered in the weighed statistic.

ResetCondition.description: The reason and context for the reset of the statistics, which is done without a trigger from an OPC UA Client, like calling the ResetStatistics Method. ResetCondition is a vendor-specific, human readable string. ResetCondition is non-localized and might contain an expression that can be parsed by certain clients. Examples are: AFTER 4 HOURS, AFTER 1000 ITEMS, OPERATOR. OPERATOR means, that an operator resets the statistics on a local HMI.

StartTime.description: Indicates the point in time at which the collection of the statistical data has been started.

SetFeederSpeed.description: Allows to set a new value for the speed of the feeder system. The OPC UA server must check if the value is between the minimal and maximum allowed speed and if the unit is allowed.

FeederLoad.description: Defines the current loaded weight on the feeder system.

FeederRunning.description: Indicates that the feeder system is running.

FeederSpeed.description: Defines the current speed of a feeder system. The unit of the FeederSpeed depends on the construction system.

MaximumFeederSpeed.description: Defines the maximal possible speed of the feeder.

MinimalFeederSpeed.description: Defines the minimal possible speed of the feeder.

data.description: Defines the current loaded weight on the feeder system.
Defines the current speed of a feeder system. The unit of the FeederSpeed depends on the construction system.
Defines the maximal possible speed of the feeder.
Defines the minimal possible speed of the feeder.

LabelLength.description: Defines the length of the labels in stock.

LabelStock.description: Indicates the level of labels in stock in percent.

LabelTypeId.description: Defines the Id of the label to be printed.

LabelWidth.description: Defines the width of the labels in stock.

PrintMediaStock.description: Defines the level of the print media in percent (e.g. ink, wear of thermal element, etc)

data.description: Defines the length of the labels in stock.
Indicates the level of labels in stock in percent.
Defines the Id of the label to be printed.
Defines the width of the labels in stock.
Defines the level of the print media in percent (e.g. ink, wear of thermal element, etc)

CurrentWeight.title: WeightType
CurrentWeight.description: Defines the current value that is measured at the sensor at the current timestamp. Might be a highly fluctuating value.

MaterialClass.description: Defines the allowed material the scale may measure. Only relevant for certain scales (e.g. totalizing hopper scale or continuous scale)

ProcessStateId.description: Contains an relating identification for the occurring ProcessStateMessage.

ProcessStateMessage.description: Contains the message of the current overall state of the scale.

RegisteredWeight.title: WeightType
RegisteredWeight.description: Defines the last valid measurement that was recorded and will be used for further processing. This is the legal registered value of the scale.

data.title: WeightType
data.description: Defines the current value that is measured at the sensor at the current timestamp. Might be a highly fluctuating value.

data.title: WeightType
data.description: Defines the last valid measurement that was recorded and will be used for further processing. This is the legal registered value of the scale.

Deviation.description: Defines the relative amount of over (positive value) or under (negative value) dosed value in relation of the TargetWeight.

ToleranceState.title: ToleranceState
ToleranceState.description: Describes the state of the tolerance deviation. The option under and over needs to be determined via TargetItemType information of TargetWeight.

data.description: Defines the relative amount of over (positive value) or under (negative value) dosed value in relation of the TargetWeight.

TU1Percent.description: Permitted percentage of items with weight less than TU1

data.description: Permitted percentage of items with weight less than TU1

FlowRate.description: Defines the conveying capacity in volume per time.

MaxFlowRate.description: Defines the maximum volume that may be conveyed. Largest volume per time.

MinFlowRate.description: Defines the minimum volume that can be conveyed. Smallest volume per time.

data.description: Defines the conveying capacity in volume per time.
Defines the maximum volume that may be conveyed. Largest volume per time.
Defines the minimum volume that can be conveyed. Smallest volume per time.

BinWeight.description: Stand-in for an unspecified data type.

Discharging.description: Indicates that a discharging process is taking place.

HopperWeight.description: Stand-in for an unspecified data type.

data.description: Stand-in for an unspecified data type.
Stand-in for an unspecified data type.

SetReferencePieceWeight.description: Sets the value for the ReferencePieceWeight (product-specific data).

CurrentPieceCount.description: Defines the number of pieces that are currently measured related to the ReferencePieceWeight.

ReferenceOptimisationRange.description: Defines the tolerance range within the scale may optimize the ReferencePieceWeight.

data.description: Defines the number of pieces that are currently measured related to the ReferencePieceWeight.
Defines the tolerance range within the scale may optimize the ReferencePieceWeight.

SupportedTargetValues.description: Defines a list of values that may be set via the recipe.

SupportedThresholdValues.description: Defines a list of threshold values that may be used within one recipe.

data.description: Defines a list of values that may be set via the recipe.
Defines a list of threshold values that may be used within one recipe.

LevelMax.description: Defines a the maximum fill level where a action is necessary.

LevelMin.description: Defines a the minimum fill level where a action is necessary.

LimitMax.description: The current fill level exceeds the allowed maximum level.

LimitMin.description: The current fill level falls below the allowed minimum level.

Limits.description: Defines a placeholder for individual additional limits that may be reached.

data.description: Defines a the maximum fill level where a action is necessary.
Defines a the minimum fill level where a action is necessary.

CloseDraftShields.description: Method to close a certain or all draft shields.

OpenDraftShields.description: Method to open a certain or all draft shields.

StartCalibration.description: Method to start the automatic calibration procedure.

StartIonisator.description: Method to start the ionization process.

StartLeveling.description: Method to start the automatic leveling procedure of the scale.

StopIonisator.description: Method to stop the ionization process.

CalibrationNeeded.description: Defines if a calibration procedure is needed and the current process should be paused.

CalibrationRunning.description: Defines if a calibration procedure is running.

DraftShieldLeftClosed.description: Defines if the left draft shield is closed.

DraftShieldRightClosed.description: Defines if the right draft shield is closed.

DraftShieldTopClosed.description: Defines if the top draft shield is closed.

LevelingRunning.description: Defines if a levelling process is running.

Policy.description: Defines the legal guidelines that apply for the scale or need to be complied by the scale.

ProcessStateId.description: Contains an relating identification for the occurring ProcessStateMessage.

ProcessStateMessage.description: Contains the message of the current overall state of the scale.

ResetTotalizer.description: Resets the TotalizedValue of this totalizer object. Only useful if reset is not related to a period of time.

TotalizedValue.description: Defines a summed up/totalized volume within a period of time.

data.description: Defines a summed up/totalized volume within a period of time.

ItemId.description: Defines a unique number that is assigned to an item.

MeasuredHeight.description: Defines the maximum height (in direction of travel) of the measured item.

MeasuredLength.description: Defines the maximum measured length (in direction of travel) of the measured item.

MeasuredVolume.description: Defines the volume of the item.

MeasuredWeight.title: WeightType
MeasuredWeight.description: Defines the registered weight that may be unmistakeable referenced to one item.

MeasuredWidth.description: Defines the maximum width (in third possible orthogonal direction to height and length) of the measured item.

data.description: Defines the maximum height (in direction of travel) of the measured item.
Defines the maximum measured length (in direction of travel) of the measured item.
Defines the volume of the item.

data.title: WeightType
data.description: Defines the registered weight that may be unmistakeable referenced to one item.
Defines the maximum width (in third possible orthogonal direction to height and length) of the measured item.

ItemPrice.description: ItemPrice defines the price related to measured weight and UnitPrice.

data.description: ItemPrice defines the price related to measured weight and UnitPrice.

ActualScaleInterval.description: Value expressed in units of mass of the difference between two consecutive indicated values, for digital indication ('d' as described in Welmec /OIML).

Range.title: Range
Range.description: Defines the range within the scale may be operated depending on the additional parameters within this type.

VerificationScaleInterval.description: Value, expressed in units of mass, used for the classification and verification of an instrument. ('e' as described in Welmec /OIML)

data.description: Value expressed in units of mass of the difference between two consecutive indicated values, for digital indication ('d' as described in Welmec /OIML).

data.title: Range
data.description: Defines the range within the scale may be operated depending on the additional parameters within this type.
Value, expressed in units of mass, used for the classification and verification of an instrument. ('e' as described in Welmec /OIML)

LowerLimit.description: Defines the lower weight limit of this zone. The lower limit is prior to the upper limit if two zones are beside each other.

Name.description: Defines the user-readable name of the zone.

UpperLimit.description: Defines the upper weight limit of this zone.

data.description: Defines the lower weight limit of this zone. The lower limit is prior to the upper limit if two zones are beside each other.
Defines the user-readable name of the zone.
